messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] children/ages
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/22/00 1:04:43 PM Eastern Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/22/00 1:04:43 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:

<< I have 3 daughters ages 16, 10 and 5 and
we have been homeschoolers for about 8 yrs now. >>

Hi Julie! DO you mind if i jump in and ask a question? Not very mannerly of
me to pounce on you! We are planning more children, but have one for now, a
three year old boy. We may not have more children for a while, and i
wondered if you could share a little about HS/US with larger age ranges.
Thank you so much, and welcome to the list!

cath
montreal
